name: Modular 2 Drum Spill Pallet, 48x24x4 Inch, 2000 lbs Capacity, Heavy-Duty Forkliftable Containment Tray for Industrial Oil & Chemical
short_description: INDUSTRIAL-GRADE STRENGTH & CAPACITY: Engineered with high-density polyethylene, this heavy-duty spill containment tray reliably supports a static load of up to 2000 lbs. It resists corrosion from oils, solvents, and harsh chemicals, while its UV-stabilized construction ensures long-lasting durability for both indoor and outdoor use.

20-GALLON DRIP & LEAK PROTECTION: Features a 20-gallon sump perfect for catching the incidental drips, leaks, and small spills that occur during daily operations. This drum spill pallet keeps workshop floors clean and safe, featuring an angled drain outlet for easy recovery and disposal of captured liquids.

SPACE-SAVING MODULAR DESIGN: A smart interlocking design allows you to vertically stack multiple platforms, significantly saving storage space when not in use. With a low profile of just 4 inches, this modular oil tray offers an efficient solution to optimize your workspace.

FORKLIFT-READY & SAFE HANDLING: Integrated pockets allow for safe and easy transport with any standard forklift, streamlining workflow. The non-slip top grille on this forklift spill platform keeps drums stable during movement, while beveled edges help prevent tripping hazards for a safer work environment.

VERSATILE MULTI-SURFACE USE: Built to adapt to any environment, this weatherproof spill tray performs on concrete, gravel, grass, and other uneven surfaces. Use it as an industrial workshop station, a garage tool organizer, a basement flood barrier, or a platform for hazardous spill containment.

product_description: The Vestil PLP2-4840-RED polyethylene pallet is a platform that has grid-shaped decks and fork openings on all four sides, can be used to support and transport goods, can be lifted using a pallet truck or forklift truck (sold separately), and is red in color. The pallet is made of polyethylene, which won't splinter like wood can, may be wiped clean, and is resistant to dents and corrosion. Fork openings on all four sides allow the pallet to be accessed with a pallet truck or forklift truck from any side. The grid-shaped decks allow liquid to drain. Two or more pallets can be stacked for storage. This pallet may be available in other colors, allowing different types of loads to be identified and segregated in a warehouse or stockroom. This pallet has a static load capacity of 6,600 lb. and a dynamic load capacity of 2,200 lb., weighs 38 lb., and measures approximately 6 x 48 x 40 inches (H x W x D). (H is height, the vertical distance from lowest to highest point; W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right; D is depth, the horizontal distance from front to back.) Each fork opening measures 4 x 9-3/4 inches (H x W). This product is intended for use in professional and industrial environments. Pallets are low platforms that can support heavy loads, and that can be lifted and transported using a pallet truck or forklift truck. Pallets can be made of wood, polyethylene, steel, aluminum, cardboard, or other materials. Loads may be bundled and secured to the pallet using straps or stretch wrap. Four-way pallets can be lifted and moved with a pallet truck or forklift truck from any side. Pallets may be color-coded for identifying and segregating different types of loads, or to indicate load capacity. The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) recognizes six standard pallet sizes, with the most common size in North America being 48 x 40 inches (W x D). Pallets without a bottom deck are called skids. Pallets can be used in warehouses, stockrooms, manufacturing and shipping facilities, and other industrial environments. Vestil manufactures materials handling equipment, including hoists and trolleys, jib and gantry cranes, loading dock equipment, and storage solutions. The company, founded in 1968, is headquartered in Angola, IN.

name: 8 Pcs Black Plastic Pallets for Basement Storage Bulk Pallets with Grid for Sale Lightweight Plastic Pallet Waterproof Storage Pad for Outside Pet Cushion (BK-8pcs-23.6 * 11.8 * 1.18in)
short_description: ADVANTAGES OF PLASTIC PALLET: Our Black Plastic Pallets plastic pallet is lighter in weight than wooden and metal pallet pallet, staff can save more energy when handling, loading and unloading goods, which can reduce the labor intensity and improve the work efficiency, so this lightweight plastic pallet is widely used.

NEW MATERIAL: Black Plastic Pallets plastic pallet is made of new HDPE, with strong impact resistance, can withstand strong weight and pressure, not easy to deformation, breakage. In the storage process can be waterproof, anti-static, anti-dust and other functions, lightweight Plastic Pallets surface hardness, long-term friction is not easy to hair, recyclable easily win the favor of the market.

SPACE SAVING: The size of lightweight Black plastic pallets is 11.8 x 23.6 x 1.18 inch / 30 x 60 x 3 cm, one package contains 8 BLack pallets. The Plastic Pallets are designed with clips on the sides that allow the mesh plastic trays to be joined together to form a large waterproof storage mat. These plastic trays can also be used with shelving, allowing goods to be placed on the shelves for three-dimensional storage, further increasing the storage capacity of the warehouse.

EASY TO CLEAN, NON-SLIP DESIGN: This Black plastic pallet is very easy to clean, can be rinsed directly with water or wiped with detergent, can keep the pallet clean and tidy, in line with the use of higher food requirements industry standards. The lightweight plastic pallet surface is designed with anti-slip texture, which can increase the friction between the goods and the pallet, preventing the goods from sliding and falling during transportation, and safeguarding the safety of the goods.

SCOPE OF APPLICATION: Our Black plastic pallets with grid design are used for the transportation and storage of agricultural products, such as fruits, vegetables, grains, etc. They can protect the agricultural products from damage during transportation and extend the shelf life of the agricultural products. Lightweight plastic pallets are easy to move and use in supermarkets, shopping malls and other retail places, used for displaying and showcasing goods, making the goods neatly and beautifully arranged and convenient for customers to buy.
